_header: O sweet Lady O Virgin pure
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, carols to
_description: James Ryman, ‘Succurre nobis miseris’, an orison to the Virgin Mary — five macaronic quatrains (abab) with this refrain and burden (bb): ‘O mater summi iudicis / Succurre nobis miseris’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O sweete lady O uirgyn pureO mater sumum
                    iudicis…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Sith thou art quene of indulgenseSuccurre nobis
                        miseris
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 334.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.

            1977: 162; 1977, 144.
